metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7980 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ecrire/exec/valider_xml.php in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that execute the XML validator on a local file via a crafted valider_xml request.  NOTE: this issue can be combined with CVE-2016-7998 to execute arbitrary PHP code.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
